website_summaries.verdict: A boat shoe silhouette turned into a snappy skater shoe. Adidas opened its skate shoe vault and created the Seeley Premiere. It showcases a suede and leather upper with optimal cushioning and a sticky outsole for excellent board feel, control and a smooth ride.The Adidas Seeley Premiere will definitely keep its wearers on top of their games. With its minimalist yet stylish design and timeless profile, hardly one can go wrong in trying these kicks on.
pros: The majority of buyers appreciated the trendy yet minimalist style of the men's Adidas Seeley Premiere
Most buyers applauded the affordable price point of Seeley Premiere
Many users noted the high-quality materials used in the Adidas Seeley Premiere
This pair has a secured fit, as felt by some skaters
Some thrashers liked the excellent board feel of this pair
It is available in the market in multiple colorways
A number of reviewers felt comfortable while wearing this shoe
Most of the buyers disclosed that they will recommend this pair to their peers
cons: The Adidas Seeley Premiere is hard to maintain, complained some users
Cleaning the white midsole and the Nubuck leather is difficult for few users
Few wearers criticized the poor ventilation of the Seeley Premiere
Some did not recommend wearing this during warm days

customer_reviews.title: Not sure these shoes are real suede
customer_reviews.text: Question the authenticity of these shoes. Or Adidas is trying to cut corners for more profit. This nubuck suede shoe sure feels like fake, fabric nubuck. They fit well, my son loves them but I feel a little ripped off. I have nubuck suede shoes and these feel like the fake nubuck of cheaper shoes. Or maybe it's just really thin, inferior nubuck. I truly don't think these will hold up or look good for very long. My boys have had Adidas Busenitz in the past and wear them into the ground, yet the suede still looks great. This shoe, I think, is going to look crappy in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: meadowlark5

customer_reviews.title: Adidas Seeley Skate Shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this pair of shoes but doesn't want to wear it too often because he's afraid of messing up the suede (good Lord!). Both sons love this Seeley style of Adidas shoes. Similar to Vans, but they love the stripes. They fit as expected and we got a good price from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mushi2Anone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fits great, and still holding up after having them for a year
customer_reviews.author: Taran Barber

customer_reviews.title: Looks ugly and creases way too easily. Coming from someone who pretty much only wear ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap material. Looks ugly and creases way too easily. Coming from someone who pretty much only wear Adidas shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Luc Tousignant

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: If you have wide feet, you might have a difficulty the first few times you use it. It's a little bit narrow but as you use it, it widens. My hubby loves these. He said that it's light weight and feels comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazona

customer_reviews.title: tall feet with high arches- the size 8 sambas fit me better than these but these work ok with the laces ...
customer_reviews.text: I have wide, tall feet with high arches- the size 8 sambas fit me better than these but these work ok with the laces very very loose. might need to buy some longer laces....
customer_reviews.author: sceptical shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good a little bit snug
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes- fit snug for the size. Hopefully they will loosten up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way to narrow, I have wide feat but I've ...
customer_reviews.text: Way to narrow, I have wide feat but I've owned a pair with different stitching near the laces. When you walk in these I start to lose circulation to my toes. Most uncomfortable shoe I've owned 8n my life.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Allen Wilson

customer_reviews.title: solid choice
customer_reviews.text: Have worn these every day for 3 months and still in good shape. Slightly irritating you can't wear them in the rain, but they look good and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: snowy

customer_reviews.title: NICE...
customer_reviews.text: Fit was slightly tight but I'm sure after some use they'll expand width wise and fit perfectly...size 12...nice looking...love the all black silhouette. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: michael thomas

customer_reviews.title: I wear these with a nice shirt, grey khakis and a tie to work ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear these with a nice shirt, grey khakis and a tie to work every day. It suits my style I guess, but I don't like the type of material used for the top part of the shoe. It frays easily. I don't remember if the description said its made of suede but it acts like it is.
customer_reviews.author: Yup

customer_reviews.title: ... them as a gift for my brother he absolutely love them. Fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Bought them as a gift for my brother he absolutely love them. Fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah I

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the first pair so much that I got a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: John Parla

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.text: They fit well and aren't tight. So far they have been great!
customer_reviews.author: alex92701

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy/fitting shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great fit/comfort. However, the grey tends to get dirty easily so be prepared to clean these often if this is a problem for you. Otherwise, great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson Salamanca

customer_reviews.title: Get you some stripes
customer_reviews.text: If you love the way adidas normally fit these are the shoe for you. A little less flexible with suede upper but my favorite shoe by far.
customer_reviews.author: warren

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a typical sneaker, nice looking, suede looks good !
customer_reviews.author: L. H. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Not as nice as my old shell toes but they are well made and I like them quite a bit. You can tell they were purpose made for skating because they are quite grippy and you can really feel the surface beneath you. That may be a negative for some but I like it. There is an unfortunate scrunching sound when walking from the tongue rubbing against the inside of the shoe. I hope that goes away with time as they break in.
customer_reviews.author: M. Melvin

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest arch support
customer_reviews.text: Reminds me of the old-school Gazelles we used to wear in high school. Get lots of compliments. Fit is perfectly consistent with all my other Adidas brand shoes. Not the greatest arch support, especially if you plan to be on your feet all day.
customer_reviews.author: OG Beach

customer_reviews.title: A little too small I fit 43 1/3 with Adidas ...
customer_reviews.text: A little too small I fit 43 1/3 with Adidas running shoes (I am a real 42), and I think I should have taken a 43 1/3 to fit well.
customer_reviews.author: De V.

customer_reviews.title: Far too narrow for a normal foot. I wore ...
customer_reviews.text: Far too narrow for a normal foot. I wore the shoes for a couple of days and realized that they'll not stretch to accommodate my feet- which are normal width. I cannot wear these as they pinch toes together .
customer_reviews.author: M. Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was fine, just not the color I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Colors
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great my only complaint is that they don't come in all black on top with white side wall. Or even grey stripes.
customer_reviews.author: ATM

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect skate shoe for a newbie like me
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect skate shoe for a newbie like me. Provides excellent heel and ankle protection. Delivered on time!
customer_reviews.author: albert mcclain

product_meta.title: Adidas ORIGINALS Mens Seeley Premiere-M Seeley Premiere
product_meta.description: Nothing silly about the Seeley. Adidas means straight business with this skate kick..
feature_bullets: Stay at the top of the skate game with the superior design and classic look of the adidas Skateboarding® Seeley Premiere shoe!
This brand is a member of the Sustainable Apparel Coalition.
Redesigned with a slender collar that conforms more closely to your ankle for an improved fit.
Uppers of durable nubuck and canvas.

Seamless toe and minimal panel design helps prevent blowouts for long-lasting wear. Classic 3-Stripe detailing adorns side. Vulcanized outsole with grippy tread for optimum skate performance. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 1 lb 1 oz Product measurements were taken using size 10, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
